text: The Union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu, India consists of three districts. * Daman district * Diu district * Dadra and Nagar Haveli Dadra and Nagar Haveli were part of Portuguese India until 1954, and Daman and Diu until 1961. In 2020, the union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli merged with Daman and Diu. ==References== Category:Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
title: List of districts of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
